body_html: Another point I'm thinking of is to not use the tf.contrib.rnn.LayerNormBasicLSTMCell but instead use tf.contrib.layers.layer_norm in the level of layer's output of my encoder/decoder. Would that make a sense?
body_text: Another point I'm thinking of is to not use the tf.contrib.rnn.LayerNormBasicLSTMCell  but instead use tf.contrib.layers.layer_norm in the level of layer's output of my encoder/decoder. Would that make a sense?
body: Another point I'm thinking of is to not use the `tf.contrib.rnn.LayerNormBasicLSTMCell`  but instead use `tf.contrib.layers.layer_norm` in the level of layer's output of my encoder/decoder. Would that make a sense?
